Assessment.QuestionText: Which of these statements about MDI are true and which statements are false?

Options.Option: An MDI application supports maximum two parent forms.
A child form remains open even when the parent form is closed.
A parent form remains open even if all the child forms are closed.
An MDI application increases the risk of data inconsistency while working with multiple child forms.
The <font face="courier new">IsMdiFormContainer</font> property is used to create a parent form.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(False), (B)-(False), (C)-(True), (D)-(True), and (E)-(False).
